page.title: 07FAMOUS PEOPLE
page.content: (Craig Macleod),is the mascot for Pencaitland A.F.C.Craig was the concert at the gala not that long afterwards over their victory. The Trevelyan hall is named after {Sir Arthur Trevelyan.}He left money after he died for the hall.Many special things take place in the hall now,that is the town hall.Also Trevelyan Crescent and Trevelyan Square is named after him. {David Much}from Saltoun was on Blockbusters,the quiz show.His school is the Ross High in Tranent.He was on not that long before the Spring of 1985.He was beaten in the first round but got Â£55 to take back home with him.He had actually went on Blockbusters before 1984,in November, but the show was recorded and shown later.
